description: Single storey rear/part side extension; first floor alteration to rear elevations incorporating a Juliet balcony, replacement of two windows; rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony and installation of three roof lights to front roof slope; reinstatement of sash windows (Joint application)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Site Location Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P_000), Existing L0 Site Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_010), Existing L1 Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_101), Existing L2 Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_102), Existing Roof (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_103), Existing South Elevation (Front) Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_170), Existing North Elevation (Rear) Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_171), Existing West Elevation (Side) Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_172), Existing Section AA (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_190), Proposed L0 Site Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P_020 rev A), Proposed L0 Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_200), Proposed L1 Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_201), Proposed L2 Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_202), Proposed Roof (Dwg. No 2013_P2_203), Proposed South Elevation (Front) Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_270), Proposed North Elevation (Rear) Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_271), Proposed West Elevation (Side) Plan (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_272), Proposed Section AA (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_290), Proposed Section BB (Dwg. No. 2013_P2_291), Design, Access and Planning Statement dated May 2023, Planning Safety Fire Strategy dated October 2022, S21002 Site & Drainage Plan, Drainage Strategy dated March 2023, Flood Risk Assessment dated March 2023

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, no part of the roof (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the buildings.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
